name: Motorvliegclub Brasschaat (MVCB)
about: Motorvliegclub Brasschaat (MVCB) is a modern and well-equipped flying school located in Brasschaat, Belgium. MVCB boasts a fleet of advanced PPL (Private Pilot License) and ULM (Ultralight) aircraft, featuring state-of-the-art "Glass Cockpit" Avionica and GPS systems. Our C172SP, equipped with Garmin technology, ensures top-notch training conditions. With a focus on safety and performance, MVCB provides comprehensive flight training programs tailored to meet the needs of aspiring pilots. Our experienced instructors and supportive environment make MVCB an ideal place for individuals to achieve their aviation goals. MVCB is committed to delivering high-quality flight training, ensuring that our students receive the best possible education in aviation.
